content: पिंज् {vI.v} {c2c} <ab>A.</ab> (पिंक्ते) {@--1@} To tinge dye. {@--2@} To touch. {@--3@} To adore. {@--4@} To sound. {@--5@} To join. {vII.v} {c10c} <ab>U.</ab> (पिंजयति-ते) {@--1@} To give. {@--2@} To take. {@--3@} To shine. {@--4@} To be strong or powerful. {@--5@} To live, dwell. {@--6@} To hurt, injure, kill. {@--7@} To speak. {@--8@} To send forth a sound.
